scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises oversized documents including several letters to John Wesley Hunt or both John Wesley Hunt and Abijah Hunt in addition to John Wesley Hunt and Abijah Hunt's account statements and bills detailing purchases made for their general store in Lexington, Kentucky. Letters to John Wesley Hunt and Abijah Hunt mainly discuss business matters such as debts, lawsuits, and goods for the store. One letter to John Hunt from Abijah Hunt (January 31, 1796) is about a customer, Major Thomas Doyal, who was seeking to enslave a Black couple who was acquainted with housework, despite the fact that slavery was illegal on his side of the river. Copies of these documents are stored in Box 1, Folders 7 and 8 along with other materials from January-June 1796.
